title: Google\Cloud\Filestore\V1\FileShareConfig
name: FileShareConfig
description:
File share configuration for the instance.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.filestore.v1.FileShareConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: The name of the file share (must be 16 characters or less).

params.name: data.capacity_gb
params.description: File share capacity in gigabytes (GB). Cloud Filestore defines 1 GB as 1024^3 bytes.

params.name: data.source_backup
params.description: The resource name of the backup, in the format projects/{project_number}/locations/{location_id}/backups/{backup_id}, that this file share has been restored from.

params.name: data.nfs_export_options
params.description: Nfs Export Options. There is a limit of 10 export options per file share.
